pages.text: A few basic changes are made to the vanilla game in order to better work given the contents of the modpack, or to just generally patch up exploits and improve the game balance.

The nerfs applied to vanilla are as follows:$(br) $(li)$(item)Villager$() discounts when de-zombified no longer stack with eachother, this prevents you from reducing every price down to 1.$(br) $(li)$(item)Iron Golems$() no longer drop $(item)Iron Ingots$(), removing classic Iron Farms. Do note that $(thing)Crucial 2$() provides an alternative way to farm iron and other ores.
